mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sesame_order(open_id, user_id, order_no, total_price, pay_price, `favorable_price`, consignee_name, consignee_phone, consignee_province, consignee_city, consignee_area, consignee_street, consignee_detailed_address, consignee_address, sesame_shop_id, sesame_shop_open_id, sesame_shop_name, commodity_json, remarks, `status`, del_flag, created_id, created_name, created_time, updated_id, updated_name) VALUES (#{sesameOrder.openId}, #{sesameOrder.userId}, #{sesameOrder.orderNo}, #{sesameOrder.totalPrice}, #{sesameOrder.payPrice}, #{sesameOrder.favorablePrice}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeName}, #{sesameOrder.consigneePhone}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeProvince}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeCity}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeArea}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeStreet}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeDetailedAddress}, #{sesameOrder.consigneeAddress}, #{sesameOrder.sesameShopId}, #{sesameOrder.sesameShopOpenId}, #{sesameOrder.sesameShopName}, #{sesameOrder.commodityJson}, #{sesameOrder.remarks}, #{sesameOrder.status}, #{sesameOrder.delFlag}, #{sesameOrder.createdId}, #{sesameOrder.createdName}, #{sesameOrder.createdTime}, #{sesameOrder.updatedId}, #{sesameOrder.updatedName})
mapper.select: SELECT o.sesame_shop_open_id AS shopOpenId, o.sesame_shop_name AS shopName, o.pay_price AS payPrice, o.total_price AS totalPrice, o.`status` AS orderStatus, o.consignee_name AS consigneeName, o.consignee_phone AS consigneePhone, o.order_no AS orderNo, o.transaction_no AS transactionNo, o.pay_type AS payType, o.created_time AS createdTime, o.pay_time AS payTime, o.delivery_time AS deliveryTime, o.transaction_time AS transactionTime, oc.`id` AS orderCommodityId, oc.open_id AS commodityOpenId, oc.sesame_commodity_name AS commodityName, oc.sesame_specifications_open_id AS specificationsOpenId, oc.sesame_specifications_name AS specificationsName, oc.sesame_specifications_thumbnail AS specificationsThumbnail, oc.`num`, oc.pay_price AS spePayPrice, oc.original_price AS originalPrice, oc.`status` AS speStatus FROM sesame_order o LEFT JOIN sesame_order_commodity oc ON o.`id` = oc.sesame_order_id WHERE o.del_flag = 1 AND oc.del_flag = 1 AND o.`id` = #{orderId} AND o.created_id = #{userId} ORDER BY oc.`sort`
SELECT `id` FROM sesame_order WHERE del_flag = 1 AND `id` = #{orderId} AND created_id = #{userId}
